author: nzhang
msg: HIVE-1681.  ObjectStore.commitTransaction() does not properly handle transactions that have already been rolled back (Carl Steinbach via Ning Zhang)

author: zhoukevin
msg: This patch fixes 2 behavior difference and it's only for Java6. 1. No matter whether we set up specific persistence delegate for enum class, HARMONY should uses the default PD rather than the given one by Encoder.setPersistenceDelegate(EnumClass, PD). 2. If a object has an enum property with a default non-null value, and if it's modified to another enum value, HARMONY should encode this property.
